trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee's latest scheme is even fishier than usual.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_TODO_00<tab>Check the fish trap at the designated location.
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the fish-filled trap to Uin Nee.
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_001<tab>Tyr Beq tells me that the land called “Amh Araeng” is nothing like Il Mheg. It's a dry, hot place where hardly anything grows. No flowers, no rivers, no lakes!

TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Some of the children there have never even <var 1A 02 /var>seen<var 1A 01 /var> a fish before! Imagine that! And yes, I think we both know where this is going...
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_003<tab>That's right! I want you to bring me a fish to show the children in the Garden of Dreams. A nice, pretty one with shiny scales!

TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_004<tab>Now, this level of preparedness may come as a surprise, but I've already had one of my underlings set a trap down in Deepwood Swim. Much easier than messing about with hooks and whatnot. All you have to do is go and see if we've caught anything!
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_020<tab>So? What have you got for me?

TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_021<tab>Oh, yes. These are...rainbowy twinkle trout. That's what we'll call them. I have big plans for you, little ones! You won't be swimming in boring old water like all the other fish, you'll be soaring through the skies of Lyhe Mheg!
TEXT_BANPIX117_03705_UINNEE_000_022<tab>And if we catch some more of these, they can all fly together to make a giant fish-rainbow! Ha ha! It's no wonder everyone thinks I'm a genius!
